message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.DL, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with automatic identification of authorship in written texts using network theory and machine learning. The focus is on the dynamics of word co-occurrence networks, which suggests a natural fit with the Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) sub-category. The use of machine learning algorithms and optimization techniques also points towards the sub-categories of Social and Information Networks (cs.SI), Machine Learning (cs.LG), Deep Learning (cs.DL), and Information Retrieval (cs.IR).
